name: Life of Mellow
description:
Love to build your own mellow village?

Farming & Survival & Simulation
But... Your journey won't be easy...!


· · · · · · Game Feature · · · · · · ·

» Survive as long as possible.
» Enjoy four seasons
» Collect resources and build many buildings.
» Farming & Crafting & Building & Survival
» Micromanage and expand your village.

Developer - Best Game Developer in South Korea
